bwwExcerpt: Alas, charm goes a long way. dtliExcerpt: Maybe Happy Ending dazzles with its love story and astounds with its visual accomplishments. There’s nothing robotic about this production: it wears its heart on its sleeve and on charm alone, succeeds.

keyPhrases.quote: His direction never fails to activate the imagination
